Version 2.0.7 - Multi-Vendor SCORM Detection

New Features

  • Vendor-specific slide detection for Articulate Storyline
  • Vendor-specific slide detection for iSpring
  • Vendor-specific slide detection for Adobe Captivate
  • Vendor-specific section detection for Articulate Rise 360
  • Vendor-specific page detection for Lectora
  • Generic HTML5 SCORM fallback detection
  • Moodle 4.x normalized SCORM tables support (scorm_attempt + scorm_scoes_value)

Improvements

  • Progress calculation using score as percentage fallback
  • Improved suspend_data parsing (removed aggressive patterns)
  • Auto-detect authoring tool and use appropriate tracking method

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.6: Enhanced SCORM tracking
  • v2.0.5: Polling and MutationObserver
  • v2.0.4: Version bump
  • v2.0.3: Notification URL fix
  • v2.0.2: Moodle 4.x tables
  • v2.0.0: WebSocket event observers
